title: Designing Language Project-Based Learning Using Collaborative MOOCs

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and online learning experience
context.additional_context: Learners perform collaborative activities in social networks and personal learning environments (PLE) using personal devices (BYOD), with summative assessments measuring learning outcomes.

learning_goals: Learners can complete language projects (translation/content production, etc.) by collaborating with peers in a collaborative MOOC environment
Learners can design real-time feedback and knowledge-sharing processes using digital tools (Google Docs, Slack, etc.)
Learners can self-assess their learning design satisfaction and motivation levels and propose improvement strategies
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
